Dating: NEW KINGDOM (not before); 19TH DYNASTY ?; NEW KINGDOM (not after)
Name: Funerary reliefs of Neferrenpet
Description: These limestone funerary reliefs come from a tomb in the necropolis of Saqqara. They represent, in two registers separated by a band of inscriptions, the funeral and the transport of furniture towards the tomb. The owner was a certain Neferrenpet, royal scribe, who lived in the New Kingdom.
